video.title: Bali
video.synopsis: Facing the everyday incidents of childhood with curiosity and imagination, thoroughly modern preschooler Bali enjoys life in the city with his family.

episodes.synopsis: Bali doesn't want to give his old clothes away to the needy; while Dad tries to fix a grocery cart, Bali tries to distract his crying sister.
episodes.title: Lollipops Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: Tomorrow is class picture day, and Bali needs a haircut; when Nanou takes Bali, Tito and Lea to the park, their soccer ball gets stuck in a tree.
episodes.title: Nanou to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Bali is having trouble sleeping; Bali and Dad have to deliver party invitations to all the tenants in their apartment building.
episodes.title: Need to Keep Going

episodes.synopsis: While Mom is out with Lea, Bali and Dad bake her a birthday cake -- even though they don't know how; Dad brings Bali and Tito to a soccer game.
episodes.title: I'm the Cook

episodes.synopsis: Bali doesn't like being the shortest among his friends; Bali and Dad set up a telescope on the apartment's rooftop garden to see a passing comet.
episodes.title: Searching for Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Bali has to take time to figure out why his video game is stalling; Olga leaves her aquarium with Bali's family to care for while she's on vacation.
episodes.title: We Need to Stay Awake

episodes.synopsis: Bali becomes bossy when he dons his new sea captain's cap; Bali is disappointed when the flowers he'd like to pick for his mom are out of season.
episodes.title: A Present for Nana

episodes.synopsis: Bali is helping his grandmother look for a special necklace that she's misplaced; during a heat wave, Bali tries everything he can to cool down.
episodes.title: I'm So Hot

episodes.synopsis: When no one claims a lost toy, Bali intends to keep it -- only to learn it belongs to a friend; Bali and Tito pretend a stranger is their nemesis.
episodes.title: I Don't Want to Give It Back / Robobear to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Bali is having his first sleepover, but he starts feeling anxious at bedtime; Bali has to buy new shoes but doesn't want to part with his old pair.
episodes.title: I'm Staying at Tamara's

episodes.synopsis: Mom plans on taking Bali to the museum, but he is tempted by the movie theater next door; Bali thinks of a gift to send to his good friend Misa.
episodes.title: A Surprise Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Bali and his friends play a treasure hunt game at his birthday party; Bali gets overwhelmed when he goes to the library for a class trip.
episodes.title: It's Wrong to Cheat

episodes.synopsis: Bali has a new tool kit, but he hesitates to allow Sacha to borrow his new hammer; when Bali gets bullied, he doesn't tell his parents.
episodes.title: I'm Not Sharing / You're Mean

episodes.synopsis: Bali becomes friends with a boy who is blind; Bali wants to go bike riding, but gets impatient with the repairs necessary before they go out.
episodes.title: My New Friend Mateo / C’mon Dad Let’s Go Let’s Go

episodes.synopsis: Bali is nervous about swimming to the deep end; Bali tries to cheer up his good friend Tamara, who is sad because she has to wear eyeglasses.
episodes.title: Splish, Splash, I'm Swimming / Don't Cry Tamara

episodes.synopsis: Bali gets upset when his sister ruins his painting; when Dad takes Bali, Tamara and Tito to a fair, Bali gets separated from the group.
episodes.title: I'm So Upset / Oh No, I'm Lost

episodes.synopsis: Bali and Tamara are seeking wildlife in their own neighborhood for a class project; there are so many things Bali would like to be when he grows up.
episodes.title: Look at that, and that, and that! / When I Grow Up

episodes.synopsis: A new student from Africa arrives; Bali and his classmates each make a building from wood blocks, but Bali accidentally knocks them all down.
episodes.title: Welcome Saba! / It Was an Accident!

episodes.synopsis: Bali is less than enthusiastic about cleaning his room; neither Bali nor Tito want to go to bed when they are having such a good time.
episodes.title: What a Mess! / But We're Not Tired

episodes.synopsis: Bali, Tamara and Tito argue when they try to make Halloween costumes together; Bali is disappointed that his dad has a cold and cannot play with him.
episodes.title: Booo / Quiet, Dad and Lea Are Sick!

episodes.synopsis: Bali is worried that his parents' argument will escalate into a divorce; Bali slips and hurts his leg, so his mom takes him to the hospital.
episodes.title: I Don't Like Parents Arguing / Ow! It Hurts!

episodes.synopsis: Bali picks up his grandparents at the train station; the kids are disappointed when they are told that they're too short to ride the go-kart track.
episodes.title: Nanna and Papi Are Lost! / I Want to Race

episodes.synopsis: Bali is obsessed with getting a new Robobear toy; though he is tempted by fast food, Bali learns about the importance of a nutritious meal.
episodes.title: Old Toys Are Fun / Yum Yum, It's Dinner Time

episodes.synopsis: Bali and Tito help out at the building's rooftop party; Bali and Tito go camping, but get frustrated when they aren't allowed to do what they want.
episodes.title: It's a Fun Party / I'm Not Having Fun

episodes.synopsis: Staying at his grandparents' home, Bali would like to play with the neighbors, but he's too shy; Tito makes fun of the training wheels on Bali's bike.
episodes.title: I'm Making New Friends / Wow! It's Not So Easy

episodes.synopsis: A power failure ruins Bali's plans to watch the new Robobear DVD; there's a Christmas present for both Bali and Lea, but Bali doesn't want to share.
episodes.title: Nooo, I want to see the movie / Yahoo It's Christmas
